dcterms:description: The dataset includes traffic data, such as flow, occupancy, and speed, collected from vehicle detector stations (VDS) along freeways and ramps. The raw data is sampled at 30-second intervals and aggregated at 5-minute intervals, specifically using flow data for one year from VDS 1114805 on California Interstate 05 NB in District 11.
dcterms:title: California Department of Transportationâ€™s Performance Measurement System (PeMS)
